mapper.insert: insert into tbl_question(`question_id`, `stem`, `option`, `answer`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modify`) values(#{questionId}, #{stem}, #{option}, #{answer}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select `id`, `question_id` as `questionId`, `stem`, `option`, `answer`, `a_chooser` as `aChooser`, `b_chooser` as `bChooser`, `c_chooser` as `cChooser`, `d_chooser` as `dChooser`, `correct_rate` as `correctRate`, `select_times` as `selectTimes` from tbl_question where `id` = #{id} and `status` = 1 limit 1
select `id` from tbl_question where `question_id` = #{questionId} and `status` = 1 limit 1
